text: @OliverDowden But that’s not at all what happened is it Oliver? Neither he nor his wife had Coronavirus.  They travelled to his parents for a combined birthday party for his wife and his mother.  Then lied and claimed they were still in London.  They broke the law, and got caught.  Fact!
